website_summaries.verdict: A nice, longer kayak that is made for fishing and includes 2 storage compartments.
pros: Able to handle a little more weight than other Lifetime kayaks
Built with 2 holders for your fishing rods and 2 compartments for sealed storage
Also comes in a popular 100-inch length
cons: This kayak does not come with a paddle

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kayak
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent kayak for the money. Nothing fancy and you won't win any races but it floats and once I added an extra cushion for the seat it was comfortable. I am 6' 3" 250 lbs and I have plenty of leg room. It was worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Trick l

customer_reviews.title: Was this new or used?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 6 mos ago. Not a bad starter kayak and does track pretty well but arrived in what can only be described as used condition. comes packaged in a plastic bag only and was scratched and gauged. Looks like they dragged it behind the delivery truck. Storage ports were broken so the covers will not go on. will need to replace them but when they were installed, they stripped the screws. Fun times. Also had to clean out the plastic remnants left inside (there was a lot). The only plus was the screwdriver left inside the cargo hold.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Received my kayak today. Came in double wrapped plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my kayak today. Came in double wrapped plastic but not a scratch on it thankfully. The pole holder it came with seems way too far away from where I’m sitting. Don’t think I’d be using it too much. Other than that, I can’t wait to take it out to the lake this weekend and hook up on some bass.
customer_reviews.author: Shi'thead

customer_reviews.title: but I love it! Took it on a "float trip" down ...
customer_reviews.text: First Kayak purchase so I can't really compare to others, but I love it! Took it on a "float trip" down the Arkansas River and everyone was pretty jealous of it! Had it a few times out on the lake and it did great. I can not say enough good things about Lifetime! Their customer service via e-mail pas phenomenal! Quick response, they went above and beyond what they needed to. I had an issue with my kayak that was my fault and they were quick to fix the issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Biggest and best Amazon purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about purchasing a kayak sight-unseen from a company that also made my picnic table- but it was drop-shipped at my door a few days later and I could be more pleased. Overall quality is great, and for the price I’d buy it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Natroneous

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product and Seller Disappeared!
customer_reviews.text: The second time out on the water, the oar broke. My son was stranded in the bay. Seller said they’d contact the manufacturer for a resolution. And now the seller isn’t responding to my request for an update. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big time fun with this yak good for a beginner but suitable ...
customer_reviews.text: Big time fun with this yak good for a beginner but suitable for a more advanced person also good deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: Woodie T.

customer_reviews.title: Kayaking Fail
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking kayak but as far as quality it fails miserably. The hull cracked on the first trip out. I started the return process but didn’t finish it in time. So now I’m stuck with a kayak with a nice hole. Don’t waste your money. Remember you get what you pay for cheap on Amazon isn’t always the best investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelty76

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who was quite picky with his demands in what he wanted out of a kayak. This however passed all the tests and he loves to go out fishing in it. Would definitely recommend to others, the shipping was also great and came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. havent used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Looks nice and have not used it yet. However, when it came in, it already has a big gash in the side and is missing the buckles for the seat back. Attempted to get replacements through lifetime with no success. Their replacement part app doesn't show parts for this kayak. Their email address doesn't work and their phone says to call back later. I suppose I will update later if I can every use the kayak. Low rating due to customer service issues
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Foltz

customer_reviews.title: great kayak
customer_reviews.text: I had never been in a kayak before I got this and I don't have one bad thing to say about it. It was a prime purchase and of course expecting 2 day shipping would be silly but I didn't think it would take 2 weeks. But anyway with no prior experience with this kayak it was like I had done it 100times even my wife does well in it. Very stable even when the wind was up. So as a whole I highly recommend this especially for begginers
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Seat so fragile
customer_reviews.text: My son is a 10 years old kid with barely 70 lbs, second time to the water today, and the bottom seat broke up, this foam material is so fragile and low quality. I hope the warranty cover for the replacement. I'll comment again after the seller response.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellet Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Kayak is fantastic and I cant believe how great of a deal it was! We've used it several times already in ponds, rivers and the bay. Very happy with this purchase! Only issue was shipping, came in large plastic bag which caused the item to have scratches when delivered
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I saw this one at Walmart for $150 cheaper. They had a slug of them.
customer_reviews.author: ron p.

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kayak for the price. It's well built and stable. I'm sure this will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sibusk

customer_reviews.title: Great! Only other kayak I have used is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! Only other kayak I have used is a sit in one. Only suggestion is take a cushion type water proof for bottom. Great kayak so far. Found plugs at cabelas that worked. Even had a bass jump in the back while going through Lilly pads
customer_reviews.author: jason steiner

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kayak
customer_reviews.text: It works and it's sturdy I like the color and weight. The storage could be better. The "recesses" could be deeper to provide actual storage. The inside the kayak storage is the whole length of the kayak so if you leave something in there after kayaking, have fun getting it out. The rod holder in the front is nice but can get in the way depending on how you orient your rod. The seat can be uncomfortable after some time but that is to be expected. Overall I like it and I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cos

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed using this kayak
customer_reviews.text: I love the kayak. Pretty stable and easy to manuver. Rod holders are in a good place. Good storage potential since two hatches open to the whole inside. I would improve the storage well in front of the seat to be large enough to hold an insulated bait bucket. too many items on board and securing straps can be a hinderance. It should be wrapped better for shipping. Mine came in a bubble wrap blanket that was damaged and the kayak had a long deep scratch from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Paul allen

customer_reviews.title: Very stable.
customer_reviews.text: First time kayaking. Great experience. At 69 I found it to be just want I wanted to take out on the Intercoastal Waterway.
customer_reviews.author: Chas M Keeys

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipping method needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is great, but the chosen shipping company needs to work on careful handling of products. It arrived with one end completely caved in like it had been dropped from a significant hight. But I was able to reshape it and get it back to normal with a heat gun and the round end of a ball peen hammer. On a positive note, it sure did give me an idea of how durable the kayak is. The fact that it could be so misshapen and not crack or break was pretty incredible.
customer_reviews.author: thomas schultze

customer_reviews.title: Fish on
customer_reviews.text: I use this at least 2 times a week. I'm a bigger guy, and this work better than I thought it would. I would get this instead of a top dollar one to start out with. Very stable, even in windy conditions. I love it and will use for years to come. Plus very easy clean up, and easy to load.
customer_reviews.author: George Selph

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The kayak tracked very well. I felt it was pretty stable even while fishing. I did buy a set of plugs to stay dry. Maybe in the future I will do a few mods as others on YouTube have done. This kayak is every bit of 52lbs. so be careful lifting it. Also some people complained about the seat, I thought it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greyalienmulder

customer_reviews.title: looks like a fine boat but it arrived with a three ...
customer_reviews.text: looks like a fine boat but it arrived with a three inch slice on the side below the water line
customer_reviews.author: James Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Priced right for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those getting into Yak fishing for the first time! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for the price point, haven't had any issues, only thing I do not like is the dry storage goes into the haul, I use a paint can and it fits down in the hole. I bought a better paddle, but the paddle that comes with this boat is very light, just get the splash guards so you leg stays dry.
customer_reviews.author: jake lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son’s birthday. He loves it so much!! He’s a not very graceful on his feet but he can stand up on this in the water with no difficulty or falling in. It is easy to get his fishing stuff organized and able to move freely while out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tip
customer_reviews.text: Myself (5'7"150lb) and my two medium size dogs (50lbs) fit on this boat, with no problem. We use it on lakes and rivers, up to Class 1 (with good flow). Sturdy and hard to tip.
customer_reviews.author: PJ in NC

customer_reviews.title: Have used many times. Extremely stable on water, ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used many times. Extremely stable on water, but moves smoothly. A little heavier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Trader Chuck’s
customer_reviews.text: Originally came without a seat but Trader Chuck’s and Lifetime solved the problem. Kayak is stable and easy to get in and out. Could use a longer paddle than the one that came with.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic and they don't honor the 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: aaron K.

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak! By paddle is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Kayak itself looks great! It’s a perfect starting fishing kayak with plenty of room to modify it to your liking. I would have given it 5 stars all around but unfortunately the paddle cane damaged. Other than that my boyfriend loved it as a birthday present ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Lets in rainwater when rains .
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kayak. But let's rain water in. If left in rain face up. Guess I'll have to sealecone all the fittings and screws. Other than that it's a good yak. But being an avid kayaker. I still prefer my perception .
customer_reviews.author: dvance

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Good back support, very stable and easy to maneuver. Not too heavy. Super fun and great for fishing or just paddling. Pole holders and storage easily accessible. I wish the storage ports had enclosed compartments to contain small items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy kayaks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and sound, wrapped in bubble wrap. Nice sturdy construction with all the features described.
customer_reviews.author: Parshman

customer_reviews.title: What a great kayak
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kayak, he is 6ft and fits perfectly and it is very stable on the lake, lots of storage love it
customer_reviews.author: Duranie

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Received on March 1. Snowing very hard with wind. It is really a nice looing kayak. Wish this weather would come around to warmness so we can try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Kayak was great, unfortunately it arrived missing some parts. Seller resolved the issue!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great kayak for under $300
customer_reviews.text: luv the kayak, stable compared to a recent purchase from local store(sun dolphin bali) which i returned same day, i thought i was sitting on a log, it was terribly unstable, , worst ever!.... this one is far superior, i added two more handles in the middle for lifting off car and paddle holder(taco clip) with tether, tracks o.k. on river, is good solid kayak, the paddle seems a bit short but is functional, seat is pretty comfortable, i did get scupper plugs to reduce water in the seat area, good price would recommend, and i dont even fish...
customer_reviews.author: Peters

customer_reviews.title: One issue
customer_reviews.text: I love this kayak for fishing. Light weight, pretty good balance, 2 dry storages is great. However, one issue... after only 3 uses the seat is torn. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped and damaged both sides and The front, returned to full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kayak! It has great stability. The kayak is wide so i feel more secure. It is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BUDGET KAYAK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice budget kayak. Finally got to fish out of it today and was really impressed. It is a good idea to upgrade the seat to a Cascade mountain stadium seat, it is much more comfortable. Also added an anchor trolley and "milk crate." Very good kayak for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are totally pleased with our kayaks
customer_reviews.text: We are totally pleased with our kayaks! It took a little long to get here, but we are extremely happy with them. Would definetely recommend these kayaks.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne M Bammer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kayak for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter kayak for the money, affordable, light weight, the paddle isn't great so may want to upgrade to a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best kayak for price
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this kayak for the price. I bought it as a loaner so friends/girlfriend can join me while kayak fishing and it's held people of all body types very well. Stable enough for EXPERIENCED kayak fisherman to stand in, and very light and easy to paddle. I've added gear tracks and more rod holders. You'll need to buy scupper plugs directly from Lifetime(it comes with none), but they are inexpensive. Very good purchase, but understand you get what you pay for; seat will get uncomfortable after a long day out, storage compartments have no stops so anything that goes in is free to slide around the entire hull, not as stable as other more quality kayaks
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorsDad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, versatile and fun. Tracks well and is not bouncy. Handles well in wind
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Kayak sturdy but 6 inch nick in the front
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. One came with a huge nick in the front top of the kayak. I would have returned it if it wasn’t such a pain in the butt to get another one delivered. Other than that the kayaks will be a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great kayak for the price. Looked everywhere to find one only to find it on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Seats ripped off on both of ours right away
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and the seats ripped off the first time we went out. Also, make sure you buy the plugs that are sold separately or you will be sitting in a puddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rice

customer_reviews.title: Crushed ends
customer_reviews.text: It did come in damaged with both ends crushed . I did not take the bubble tape off of it for about 2 weeks but when I did I was shocked to see the crushed ends with 3 one inch sleets . I f26 it and have used it with no problem . But I bought anew one and got a damaged one.
customer_reviews.author: Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Grate for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a grate beginner kayak , I recommend getting dry bags for it , and a better ore. The ore it comes with is short and flimsy. Other than that it’s very comfortable and stable grate for river conditions.
customer_reviews.author: CPatterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad. He Loves it during the summer
customer_reviews.author: McKay

customer_reviews.title: Not super agile or great handling but very stable to fish ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Not super agile or great handling but very stable to fish out of.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great boat
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible investment that didn’t break the bank. It’s very stable, in fact my 13 yr old daughter will sometimes stand in it and use it as a paddle board
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Cargo Holds are Empty!
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the kayak, but my question is why is there nothing inside the cargo holds to store belongings in? It's just a hole into the inside of the kayak. Am I missing something?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purshase
customer_reviews.text: First time on a sit-on-top, absolutely love it. Very stable, first time out, there was some wind but nothing horrible. Getting the feel of casting and reeling in was easy, caught fish and it was easy taking them off the hook. No rocking what so ever. Perfect buy
customer_reviews.author: Nikeeamo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun to ride on!
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to Kentucky and have a small lake in backyard. The kayak is the best way to relax and quickly get out on the water!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have been out on it twice. I did make my own stabilizers for it. Just makes me feel more safe when I’m far out
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hampel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing kayak. Good storage and is very stable. I am 250 lbs and this is no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Tamarack Kayak
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Husband, he loved it exactly what he wanted. Very smooth transaction. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dupuy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early
customer_reviews.text: I like the kayak. I haven't had a chance to try it out. That is why 4 stars. I can't answer the other questions It arrived early. Everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak. We opted to buy new paddles other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak. We opted to buy new paddles other than use the ones that came with it. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just try not to love this kayak, I bet you can not do it
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest. I'm looking to put an electric motor on mine shortly. Can not split with it.it handles all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: My son was absolutely ecstatic about this kayak. Stability is awesome, and the kayak itself was more than what we expected. Very good buy and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Holt

customer_reviews.title: Product amazing. Shipping-not so much
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that the shipping took forever, the product is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Audra S

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged and came in a sack no box included
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome first timer kayak! Pretty good quality and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Money CAN buy happiness
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this kayak! Lots of room, very stable and so much dry storage! Would definitely recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to maneuver. Moves through water well and is quite stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kayak is great!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bubble wrapped. Took it out on the water worked really well! Large storage compartments but nothing to keep things dry.. phone, camera! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love taking this out on the water. It works for fishing or even a few float trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken rod holder
customer_reviews.text: Boat looks great but my rod holder it was suppose to come with only cane in a couple broke pieces
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Morrison Young

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough to be very stable....
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. First day out my granddaughter took right to it, without any help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Camping man.

customer_reviews.title: Kayak came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Kayak came damaged with a large dent on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Shafik Kassam

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but ice on lakes so havent tried them yet
customer_reviews.author: wesley evans

customer_reviews.title: Finally used it and our son loves it, he ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it and our son loves it, he and the other boys had a blast on it; my husband on the other hand is 6'4" and wasn't able to stay on, ending up in the water each time he tried
customer_reviews.author: cambam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kayak did great on the rivers so far for me also handles really good👍
customer_reviews.author: Floyd  A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Price and expectations perfect. Very versatile and comfortable in this price point
customer_reviews.text: Price and expectations perfect. Very versatile and comfortable in this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this Yak.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak for a fishing trip with my friends. My friend bought a $1000 kayak and I thought this Kayak wasn't too far behind. I was very pleased with its tracking and I didn't fall in the water so the stability was good enough. However, It isn't amazing stability where you can stand up and cast in it ,without it shaking around and you being at risk of falling in. In summary, It is a great first kayak to get for fishermen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Its very stable and comfortable, even for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it. Its very stable and comfortable, even for me. I'm 6'7" 250. i can comfortably sit in it and fish. you will get your butt wet because of the scrubber holes through the kayak. I saw they sell plugs but i haven't ordered them. Great Kayak at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa  Beaurain

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH A DEEP SCRATCH ON THE BOTTOM. KAYAK IS NOT AS STABLE AS SOME OTHERS BUT WORKS OK.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Nice kayak for price
customer_reviews.text: A nice kayak for the price! I would recommend this kayak because a lot of kayaks are over $600 and this was a nice kayak for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this Kayak
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is stable on the water, comfortable to sit in for hours, and has enhanced my fishing experience. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Husband had been looking for a Kayak and I told him I would find him one. I found the perfect one! He couldn't wait to get it into the water. He said it was great, very stable, no problems with it, he really likes it, and can't wait to go fishing again. Caught a ton of bluegills first time he took it out too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaR

customer_reviews.title: It was very good. I sit higher up and it moves through ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very good. I sit higher up and it moves through the water with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customermjs

customer_reviews.title: Compartment lid mount cracked
customer_reviews.text: Used it two times and the front water proof compartment screw off lid the mount was cracked
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good kayak, lots of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Good kayak, lots of storage space, and stable. Haven't tried shooting from it, and don't know that I will much, but for a duck hunting kayak, I want to feel comfortable at least. It doesn't track the straightest, but that is probably because of the thickness of the keel at the back (I don't think that's the right word, but oh well).
customer_reviews.author: HappierThanABird

customer_reviews.title: Great Fishing kayak
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Tamarack Angler kayak just a few times since it arrived but I'm very impressed with the fit & finish of it. I'm 6 ft tall & about 200 lbs & fit comfortably in it. I like the removable front rod holder, the kayaks relatively light weight & its stability, I'm still outfitting it & want to add a good anchor system. All in all I'm very impressed with my first time fishing kayak & I got it at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: George V.

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my Tamarack angler
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Tamarack angler. Good deal at 349$ just the right weight at 50 lbs. no damage from shipping. Was what I was looking for in a beginner kayak. Had to buy oars separate. Can't wait to get it in the water after the weather breaks.
customer_reviews.author: chersmoke

customer_reviews.title: Stable and Comfy Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was a little longer than expected but arrived at a decent speed. The deliver person said they've had it sitting there but couldn't bring it until the scheduled date. Hope that can expedited soon for others. The kayak arrived in a large box and in mint condition. It has plenty of storage options. After getting it on the water, we are very satisfied with what this kayak can do. Stable and gets you exactly where you want to go! My thirteen year old purchased this for his first kayak and he couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: CJ410

customer_reviews.title: Have enjoyed this kayak
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty happy with this kayak. The seat bottom pulled loose from the plastic mounting pins on the second trip, but not a huge deal. I really wish kayak companies would consider offering a SUV version of kayak that would be more functional for family use. Compartmentalized hull for easier storage, built in cooler, built in / retractable transport wheels, a seat that would rotate just a bit, etc. From what I've seen they all offer just about the same accessories.
customer_reviews.author: rharring

customer_reviews.title: Great sit on top
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for a year, this is the best for money for fishing. Handles look strong but I'm careful based on other comments. Plug the drain holes under seat and forward of seat or you will get wet sitting down. Should have come with plugs. Very stable but seat back is flimsy and will fold over above the strap on you if you are in the 200 lb range like me. Rod holder nice, don't let it go, I doubt it will float.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Received the kayak in terrible condition and missing several plugs. I returned it within the first few minutes of observing its terrible condition.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Claods kayak
customer_reviews.text: this Kayak, is the Best, I have used it a couple time on run trial and one time for fishing, I could not be happier with this product, of course I have to beef it up so it is much, much stable... I even added a tower.. ha, ha good stuff. I can wait for the weather to turn warm. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Claods

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Tamarack Sit-On-Top Kayaks are NOT WORTH THE $$$
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these Lifetime Tamarack Kayaks based on the reviews I read on Amazon.com and intend to RETUIRN ALL 3 OF THEM!!! 2 of the 3 seats broke and 1 of them leaked the first time out...and they DO NOT TRACK as well as I was led to believe. I would not recommend these to anyone, regardless of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lifetime Tamarack is better than the Journey in balance and tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: ... bit to get here but the shipping co was great and moved up the delivery date
customer_reviews.text: These took a bit to get here but the shipping co was great and moved up the delivery date. They are great quality and we love them. We take them out almost every week. Am now looking at getting another one for our son. We love that the fishing rod holder on the front side is removable so we can remove them for transporting. Our did NOT come with paddles and that's the only critique I have, that they should come with them. Very happy with these otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie V.

customer_reviews.title: It's great gets me to places where my bass boat can't ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great gets me to places where my bass boat can't love the rod holder in front ,the only drawback is the seat wish it had more padding other than that Love It
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yak
customer_reviews.text: 6 month review I got it on sale for $375 and I could not be happier. Pros: VERY stable, I could easily stand up and fish in mild wind and waves on the grass flats Light and easy to transport on top of a car Lots of storage and tie down points Great build quality Cheap white bait buckets with the red lit fit PERFECTLY into the dry wells and even lock into place ( Attractive looks Cons: The rod holder is too far forward and there is only one of them Back scupper holes blast water up your butt if you move around (buy some plugs for them) Extra info: I'm 5' 4'' and 125 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Just the right size for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my first fishing kayak so I can't compare it to any other. That being said, I love it. Just the right size for me. I'm 6' about 180lbs and I fit on it comfortably. It moves easy on the water and is very stable. I'm new to kayaks and I felt safe on it. There wasn't a getting used to it period. As soon as I got on it, i felt right at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Fishing Kayak
feature_bullets: Constructed of UV-Protected High-Density Polyethylene. Stable Flat Bottom. Deep Hull Tracking Channels. Stability Chine Rails
Multiple Footrest Positions for Different Size Riders. Adjustable Padded Seat Back and Seat Pad for Comfort. Front and Rear Shock Cord Straps
Two Flush Mounted Fishing Rod Holders. One Top Mount Fishing Rod Holder
Two 6" Storage Compartments in Rear and Center. One Paddle Keeper with Shock Cords. Front and Rear T-Handles for Easy Transport
